title: Circumference of a circle - write code

content.question: Which of the following variable declarations are most appropriate to replace /* missing declarations */ in the code segment?

choices.label: int pi = 3.14159; int diam = 1.5; final int circ;
final int pi = 3.14159; int diam = 1.5; int circ;
final double pi = 3.14159; double diam = 1.5; double circ;
final double pi = 3.14159; final double diam = 1.5; final double circ = 0.0;

content.answer: final double pi = 3.14159; double diam = 1.5; double circ;

skill.text: 2.A: Write program code to implement an algorithm.
